sources.title: My Son the Hero (1943) COMEDY
sources.description:
Director: Edgar G. Ulmer
Stars: Patsy Kelly, Roscoe Karns, Joan Blair


Learning that his long-unseen son is arriving for a visit, a small-time con-man enlists his cronies to help him pretend to be a wealthy and important businessman

metadata.Plot: A broken down boxing promoter finds that his son has become a hero fighting in the pacific and is about to come home for a war bond tour. Trouble is, he's been lying about how successful he's been for years. So he enlists his punchy fighter and his ex-wife to help him put on a fake show of opulence in a borrowed mansion.
metadata.Writer: Doris Malloy, Edgar G. Ulmer, Sam Newfield
metadata.Actors: Patsy Kelly, Roscoe Karns, Joan Blair
